@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
                
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>
data.data||data.list||book_list||data.publication_list||data.result||data

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let book_list = [];
let res = JSON.parse(result);
let key = String(java.get("key"));
let page = Number(java.get("page"));

try {
  if (res.search_tabs) {
    for (let i = 0; i < res.search_tabs.length; i++) {
        let books = res["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
        if (books != null) list = list.concat(books);
    }
  }
} catch (e) {}

for (let $ of list) {
   book_list.push($.book_data ? $.book_data[0] : ($.video_data ? $.video_data[0] : $));
}

JSON.stringify(book_list)
</js>$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=java.getElements('ul li')
let data=[];
if(list.length>1){
	for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
data.push({
	title:list[i].select("a").text(),
	href:list[i].select("a").attr("href")
			})
}}else{
id=java.get("id");
url=`https://m.yuzhaiwen.com/novel/${id}.html`;
result=java.ajax(url);
page1=String(java.getString("text.开始阅读@href",result)).match(/\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/)?.[1]||null;
pages=String(java.getString(".chapterList@li.-1@a.-1@html",result)).match(/\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/)?.[1]||null;
  for (let i = page1; i <= pages; i++) {
data.push({
	title:`第${i - page1 + 1}章`,
	href:`/novel/${id}/${i}.html`
	})
}}
//java.log(JSON.stringify(data))
data
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.java.security,
    Packages.java.security.interfaces,
    Packages.java.security.spec,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function encrypt(str){

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

    txt = java.getString("#booktxt@html");
    java.longToast("解密失败");
} else {
    txt = bes.map(b => String(java.base64Decode(b))).join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
(function(){
    // 使用正则检测分页标签
    const hasNextLink = /<a\s+rel=\"next\"\s+class=\"next\"[^>]*>下—页<\/a>/i.test(result);
    if (!hasNextLink) return '';
    
    try {
        // 动态生成分页URL（适配数字型URL）
        let url = baseUrl;
        const pageMatch = url.match(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/);
        if (!pageMatch) return '';
        
        const [_, baseId, currentPage] = pageMatch;
        const pageNum = currentPage ? parseInt(currentPage) : 1;
        
        // 安全限制（最大3页）
        if (pageNum > 2) return ''; // 第3页后停止
        
        // 生成新URL（如 /123_2.html → /123_3.html）
        return url.replace(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/, `${baseId}_${pageNum + 1}.html`);
    } catch(e) {
        return '';
    }
})()
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function replace (content) {
  const source = "内暴强情缝贪插逼操潮喷阴艳裸乳荡穴鸡淫苞奸胸射嫩肉骚性蒂茎陰騷奶屄成人药春迷尿粉肛龟头A精屌口狂蜜处女唇道阳虐虫妇液色颜熟交爽臀爆舔做爱欲吹自慰点gG玉幼援抽Bb水母狗户部要了奴小脚痒酥死我兽揉搓捏扣抠棍棒洞密美少摩腿春乱伦露漏浪开巨根菊巴黑豪好肥送艳被干拔乱理白刺体下面诱感快货比日妈你娘婊子配仙火叫在里子宫给聊照流群屁眼马无码友拳洞片黄偷禁套弄位脱光舒服溜舞丢还糜妻换妓招嫖娼aA毛Hh一夜本热推图书娃男抓浑圆饱满润湿滑丰腴韵尤物横陈存娇喘息麻桃透风腹长粗肿胀人紧夹吸撅起来雪发翘硕大胴双草坐挲跨柔软臂瘫媚秘破"
  const replacementChars = source.split("")
  replacementChars[43]="AV"
  content = content.replace(/<i class="icon icon-uni(.{4})"><\/i>/g, (_, p1) => String.fromCharCode(parseInt(p1, 16)));

  return Array.from(content, char => {
    const code = char.charCodeAt(0)
    if (code >= 0xE001 && code <= 0xE101) {
      return replacementChars[code - 0xE001]
    } else {
      return char
    }
  }).join('')
}
replace(result)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//默认选择源
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(result));
if(baseUrl.match(/\?keyword=/)){
if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
$.book[*]||$..lists[*]||$.[*]

bookSourceComment: // Error: Timed out waiting for 60000 ms

jsLib:
time = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000).toString()

function getSign (key, type, num) {
  const { java } = this
  const secret = 'magic2019'
  let baseString

  switch (type) {
    case 's':
      baseString = `channel=ft0001&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=0&query=${java.encodeURI(key)}&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 't':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&gid=1&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 'c':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&chapterid=${num}&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    default:
      throw new Error('Invalid type')
  }

  return java.md5Encode(baseString).toUpperCase()
}

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);

    }

      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");

      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

<js>
let id = result.match(/\{siteid:'(\d+)',bid:'(\d+)',cid:'(\d+)'\}/);
if (id) {
    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}
</js>
